standup.title: Guess who gave the update
standup.summary: Each team member submits their updates ahead of time. In standup, everyone else has to guess who gave which update.
standup.description: This one takes a bit of preparation and needs a facilitator. The facilitator sets up a channel for everyone to submit messages anonymously (Google Forms work well). Each team member needs to submit 2 - 3 updates ahead of the standup. The facilitator then reads out each update and the others have to guess whose update it is.
benefits: This makes people more aware of who is working on which task
It helps to bond the team through a bit of fun.
